scripts.check: tsc && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npm exec depcheck && echo 'linting' && TIMING=1 npm exec -- eslint --ext .ts --cache . && echo 'ok'
scripts.start-arm64-docker: npm run docker-build-arm64 && npm run docker-run
scripts.start-arm64-native-debug: npm exec tsc && ( echo 'dir ./tmp' | redis-server - & ) && node dist/main-debug.js
scripts.start-arm64-native-server: npm exec tsc && ( echo 'dir ./tmp' | redis-server - & ) && node dist/main-server.js
scripts.start-gcp-job: npm run docker-build-amd64 && npm run docker-push && npm run gcp-run-job
scripts.start-gcp-server: npm run docker-build-amd64 && npm run docker-push && npm run gcp-run-server && npm run gcp-quick-test
scripts.start-prod: npm exec tsc && docker buildx build -t gcr.io/awardwiz/awardwiz:scrapers2 --platform linux/amd64 ./ && docker push gcr.io/awardwiz/awardwiz:scrapers2 && kubectl rollout restart -n lg deployment/awardwiz && kubectl rollout status deployment/awardwiz --timeout=90s
scripts.docker-build-arm64: tsc && docker buildx build -t gcr.io/awardwiz/awardwiz:scrapers --platform linux/arm64 ./
scripts.docker-build-amd64: tsc && docker buildx build -t gcr.io/awardwiz/awardwiz:scrapers --platform linux/amd64 ./
scripts.gcp-run-job: gcloud beta run jobs update awardwiz --execute-now --image gcr.io/awardwiz/awardwiz:scrapers --region us-central1 --max-retries=0 --memory=4Gi --cpu=4
scripts.gcp-run-server: gcloud run deploy awardwiz --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --image gcr.io/awardwiz/awardwiz:scrapers --memory=4Gi --cpu=4 --execution-environment=gen2 --set-env-vars=$(cat .env.local | egrep '^PROXY_ADDRESS=' | head -1)
